English: Find the Fog Repeller Turbine [ALL_ITEMS] and bring it to the extraction scan in [EXTRACTION_ZONE]
Description: The "Fog Repeller Turbine" is an item that the players can pick up in game, which works sort of like a big fan and clears the area around the player of fog.

French.Translation: Cherchez la turbine de répulsif à brouillard [ALL_ITEMS] et amenez-la au scanner d'évacuation de la [EXTRACTION_ZONE].

Italian.Translation: Trovare la turbina anti-nebbia [ALL_ITEMS] e portarla alla scansione di estrazione in [EXTRACTION_ZONE].

German.Translation: Finden Sie die Nebelverdrängungsturbine [ALL_ITEMS] und bringen Sie sie zum Extraktionsscan in [EXTRACTION_ZONE].

Spanish.Translation: Encuentra la turbina antiniebla de [ALL_ITEMS] y llévala al escáner de extracción en la [EXTRACTION_ZONE].

Russian.Translation: Найдите антидымовую турбину ([ALL_ITEMS]) и отнесите к сканеру извлечения в [EXTRACTION_ZONE].

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Encontre turbina do repulsor de névoa [ALL_ITEMS] e leve-a até o escâner de extração na [EXTRACTION_ZONE]

Polish.Translation: Znajdź i zanieś turbinę przeciwmgielną [ALL_ITEMS] do skanera punktu ewakuacyjnego w strefie [EXTRACTION_ZONE]

Japanese.Translation: フォグリペラータービン [ALL_ITEMS] を見つけ、それを[EXTRACTION_ZONE]の脱出スキャンまで運べ

Korean.Translation: [ALL_ITEMS] 안개 제거기 터빈을 찾고 [EXTRACTION_ZONE]의 탈출 스캔으로 운반

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 找到驅霧器渦輪[ALL_ITEMS]並帶到[EXTRACTION_ZONE]的撤離掃描點

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 找到驱雾器涡轮[ALL_ITEMS]并将其带到[EXTRACTION_ZONE]的撤离扫描点

name: WardenObjectiveData.Retrieve_Essential_Items_1_Defogger_R2B4.MainObjective_MainObjective
